translation.en: [woman] People think dreams are an escape.
translation.it: Tutti credono che i sogni siano una via di fuga,

translation.en: [woman] A chance to slip away from waking life
translation.it: una possibilità di scappare dalla realtà

translation.en: to a world with no consequence.
-But that's not true. -[haunting choral music playing]
[woman] Your dreams don't just happen.
translation.it: I sogni non si avverano da soli,

translation.en: We make them happen.
And we design them with care just for you.
translation.it: E li abbiamo progettati con cura anche per te.

translation.en: We have our reasons, and we have our rules.
translation.it: Abbiamo le nostre ragioni e le nostre regole.

translation.en: We make your dreams to help you on your journey.
translation.it: Creiamo i tuoi sogni per aiutarti nel tuo viaggio,

translation.en: And where this one's going, she's gonna need all the help she can get.
translation.it: e, in questo viaggio, lei ha davvero bisogno di aiuto.

translation.en: [exhales] Good morning, Pig.
-Morning, Bugsy. -[Bugsy squawks]
-[Dad grunting] -[girl] Hey, Dad. What'd you get?
[sighs] Many leagues have I traveled across the sea to bring you breakfast.
translation.it: Ho navigato tanto per portarti la colazione.

translation.en: Oh. Thank you. Here. Here, let me help you with that.
translation.it: Oh! Grazie. Ecco, lascia che ti aiuti.

translation.en: -Is that better? -Thank you. -Yeah. -[Dad grunts]
-Hey, Bugsy! -[Bugsy squawks]
[Dad] All right.
Batter up.
And… batter up.
-[breeze blowing] -[Dad] We on course, kiddo?
[girl] The wind's come around.
So what're you gonna do?
Bow up.
-[tiller squeaks] -Bow up.
-[wrench straining] -A little more. Little more.
[Dad] Here ya go, kiddo.
His name is Fred.
Oh, hi, Fred.
And I've got Seymour.
Dad, why do I have to learn math
if I'm gonna take care of the lighthouse, like you?
translation.it: se dovrò occuparmi del faro come te?

translation.en: I already know everything there is to know about the lighthouse anyway.
translation.it: E so già tutto quello che c'è da sapere sul faro.

translation.en: Answer me this question.
What is a lighthouse for?
To keep ships safe.
[Dad] No. That's not what it's for.
But when you can answer that question…
I'll give you the key to the lighthouse, and that's a promise.
translation.it: ti darò la chiave del faro, te lo prometto.

translation.en: -[girl gasps softly] -[Dad] Now, bed.
You don't want Pig?
[clicks tongue] I am 11.
Well, sorry, Pig. It's a rite of passage.
translation.it: Beh, scusa, Maiale. È grande adesso.

translation.en: What's that?
Oh, no. No, you don't have to worry. I'll still be here for you.
translation.it: No, non preoccuparti, io ci sarò sempre per te.

translation.en: All right. Well, good night.
Wait!
-[Dad] Hmm? -One story?
-Flip story? -[girl gasps excitedly]
All right.
I got one you never heard before.
translation.it: Ne ho una che non conosci.

translation.en: As you know, Flip and I, we lived the outlaw life. Hmm?
translation.it: Come ben sai, io e Flip vivevamo come dei fuorilegge.

translation.en: Hunting treasure every night, and… eh, what have you.
translation.it: Andavamo a caccia di tesori ogni notte, e non solo.

translation.en: Now, one day ol' Flippy comes up to me, and he says, "Guess what I've heard."
translation.it: Un giorno il vecchio Flip mi disse: "Indovina cosa ho sentito?"

translation.en: [quietly] He's heard about these Pearls. Magic Pearls.
translation.it: Aveva sentito parlare di alcune perle, perle magiche.

translation.en: You get one of these Pearls, and you can wish for whatever you want.
translation.it: Ne bastava una per avverare qualsiasi desiderio.

translation.en: The trouble was that these Pearls can only be found
translation.it: Il problema è che queste perle si trovano solo

translation.en: in the most dangerous waters known to mankind.
translation.it: nelle acque più pericolose al mondo.

translation.en: -[eerie music playing] -The Sea of Nightmares.
Well, soon as I heard that, I was all, "Count me out. I don't want anything to do with it."
translation.it: Sentendo quel nome, ho detto: "No, io non voglio saperne nulla".

translation.en: Then, of course, Flip, you know him, he goes and he does… the Double-Knock.
translation.it: Ma conosci Flip, ha fatto la doppia bussata.

translation.en: And when your partner does the Double-Knock--
translation.it: E se il tuo socio fa la doppia bussata…

translation.en: -You can't refuse. -[Dad] That's right.
[both] Outlaw Code.
Set sail, we did.
Well, I tell you what, it was cold. It was mighty cold.
translation.it: E ti dirò, faceva freddo, molto freddo.

translation.en: But I was thinking, well, in that kind of climate, Flip might not smell so bad.
translation.it: Ma speravo che, con quel freddo, Flip non puzzasse così tanto.

translation.en: Then the storm came.
[softly] And the waves.
-Suddenly there was this rumbling sound. -[thunder rumbles]
-It was all around us. -[floorboards creak]
-[Dad] And it grew louder by the second. -[wind picks up]
translation.it: Il rumore aumentava sempre di più.

translation.en: [Dad] It was the biggest, deadliest whirlpool I'd ever seen.
translation.it: Era il vortice più grande e letale che avessi mai visto.

translation.en: That boom swung around, hit me on the backside,
translation.it: Il boma, ruotando, mi ha colpito sulla schiena

translation.en: and tossed me into that water.
translation.it: e mi ha scaraventato in acqua.

translation.en: And down I went, like a lead weight.
translation.it: Sono caduto come un peso di piombo.

translation.en: Down… and down,
until I noticed there was a hole right there in the bottom of the sea.
translation.it: finché non ho notato una cavità in fondo al mare.

translation.en: So I swam in.
What's on the other side?
It's a dead place.
No life of any kind,
translation.it: Non c'era nessuna forma di vita,

translation.en: just littered with bones of ancient sea creatures.
translation.it: solo ossa di antiche creature marine.

translation.en: That's when it came for me.
The monster.
-It rose up out of the darkness. -[low growling]
[Dad] Black as night, and bigger than any creature I had ever seen.
translation.it: era nero come la pece e più grande di qualsiasi altra creatura,

translation.en: With long, smoky, inky tentacles.
translation.it: con lunghi tentacoli di fumo nero.

translation.en: I was frozen in fear.
And it just, kind of slowly…
-[distorted] …slowly… -[monster snarls]
…reached out and grabbed me and shook me for all I was worth! And I take--
translation.it: mi ha afferrato e mi ha scosso più forte che poteva! E io…

translation.en: Stand by.
-[radio chatter continues] -Wait, you can't stop now.
What? You mean during the scary part?
-It wasn't scary. -[Dad] Mm-hmm.
It was a potentially interesting start to a story.
translation.it: Ma potrebbe essere un inizio interessante.

translation.en: -[Dad] Go for Peter. -Potentially… interesting start.
[Peter] Copy.
-[indistinct radio chatter] -[Peter] Nemo, listen to me. There's a fishing boat off Lopez that's in trouble.
translation.it: Nemo, c'è un peschereccio nei guai al largo di Lopez.

translation.en: It's gonna get bad out there tonight.
Listen, you know what to do if the power goes out, right?
translation.it: Sai cosa fare se manca la corrente, vero?

translation.en: Fire up the backup generator, clear the sump pump, radio Carla if there's a problem.
translation.it: Accendo il generatore, libero la pompa e chiamo Carla, se ho problemi.

translation.en: [giggling] I got it, Dad.
Sweet dreams.
Hey… I got you.
translation.it: Ehi, - sono io che conosco bene te. - Smettila!

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Stop.
translation.it: - sono io che conosco bene te. - Smettila!

translation.en: Good night.
[Peter] Good night. I'll be back soon.
[echoing] Dad?
Help! Help!
Help!
[frantically] Help!
Help!
Carla?
[Nemo] Carla, where's my dad?
he's gone, honey.
He's gone.
[shakily] I'm sorry.
-[Nemo crying] -[Carla] Those were his wishes. Did he talk with you about any of this?
translation.it: È ciò che voleva lui. Non ne aveva parlato con lei?

translation.en: Her mother died when she was a baby, so she's used to a single-parent household.
translation.it: Sua madre è morta quando era piccola, è cresciuta con un solo genitore.

translation.en: She doesn't have anybody else.
It's you, or she becomes a ward of the state.
translation.it: O lei, o un tutore dello stato.

translation.en: They'll stick her in a group home or in foster…
translation.it: Andrà in una casa-famiglia o in affido…

translation.en: Nemo, do you remember your uncle?
translation.it: Nemo, ti ricordi di tuo zio?

translation.en: No. I've never met him before.
Your dad left instructions.
If anything ever happened to him…
translation.it: che, se gli fosse successo qualcosa,

translation.en: he wanted you to go and stay with your uncle in the city.
translation.it: saresti dovuta andare da tuo zio in città.

translation.en: But I have to take care of the lighthouse.
Nemo, you can't live alone.
translation.it: Nemo, non puoi vivere da sola.

translation.en: But I can do it. I know how. He's taught me everything.
translation.it: Ma so come fare, lui mi ha insegnato tutto.

translation.en: -[Carla] I'm sorry, honey. -[Nemo breathing shakily]
[man] "For tho' from out our bourne Of Time and Place
translation.it: "Oltre il nostro tempo e il nostro spazio,

translation.en: The flood may bear me far"
"I hope to see my Pilot face to face
translation.it: Spero di vedere il mio Capitano faccia a faccia,

translation.en: When I have crost the bar"
[softly] That's him.
[quietly] Hello?
No, it's not a good time.
My uh… My brother was lost at sea.
translation.it: Mio fratello è scomparso in mare.

translation.en: Mm. No, lost lost. Like, I'm at his funeral.
translation.it: No, è morto. Sono al suo funerale.

translation.en: We were estranged, actually.
Estranged.
I'm… I'm happy with my plan.
translation.it: A me va bene il mio piano.

translation.en: -Carla. -Hello.
Hello.
[sighs] I'm so sorry for your loss.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per la tua perdita.

translation.en: Our loss, obviously.
Um, we can…
We better hit the road if we're gonna catch the ferry.
translation.it: È meglio andare, se vogliamo prendere il traghetto.

translation.en: -[horn honks] -Uh, no shoes on the carpet.
-Oh, I'm sorry. -No…
translation.it: - Niente scarpe, sul tappeto. - Scusa. No…

translation.en: It's a great building.
You never have to leave. [chuckles]
Which I basically never do 'cause I work from home.
translation.it: Io non lo faccio mai, perché lavoro da casa.

translation.en: Sorry.
There's a dry cleaner's, a coffee shop.
They even have a, um… a spinning studio downstairs.
translation.it: Fanno anche spinning al piano terra.

translation.en: Are you into spinning?
Like spinning around?
I don't know. I… I've never tried it.
translation.it: Non lo so. Non l'ho mai fatto.

translation.en: Hey… [spluttering]
Do you like doorknobs?
These are my babies.
You're a doorknob salesman?
[scoffs] I'm not… I'm not a doorknob salesman.
I own a company that sells doorknobs.
We sell latches. We sell escutcheons.
Here's where we differ.
A lot of the glamour boys in the industry, they chase the latest trends, not us.
translation.it: Molti del settore seguono le ultime tendenze, ma noi no.

translation.en: No, thank you. We'll stick with the classics.
translation.it: No, grazie. Continuiamo con i classici.

translation.en: 'Cause it's security. It's not fashion.
translation.it: Questa è sicurezza, non è moda.

translation.en: -Don't touch that. -Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
That's not a toy.
This is an antique.
Came from a prison cell in Alcatraz.
translation.it: È di una cella di Alcatraz.

translation.en: In case I need to lock you in your room. [chuckles]
translation.it: Può servirmi a chiuderti in camera.

translation.en: I-- I-- I'm not gonna lock you in your room.
translation.it: Non ti chiuderò in camera tua.

translation.en: That was… humor.
[splutters] Do you need a hug or whatever?
Well, good night.
[Nemo, softly] I know, Pig. I wish we could be with him again too.
translation.it: Sì, Maiale, anch'io vorrei tornare da lui.

translation.en: Pig.
-What? -[Pig oinks]
Wait!
-[Pig grunts, squeals] -No.
[Nemo] Don't! Stop, stop! Wait!
Stop! Pause. Pause. Pause. Pause.
No! No, no, no! No! [gasps]
Stop! Stop! No, no, no, no, no! No! No!
[Nemo] Red light. Stop!
-[tapping] Red light! -[Pig oinks]
-Come on, Pig. -[Pig squealing]
-[taps] Thanks. -[Pig grunts]
-[Nemo] Hi, Bugsy. -[Bugsy caws]
Dad?
-[loud thumping upstairs] -Dad?
Dad?
Who are you?
Nobody? [laughs nervously]
I'm just one of those weird things that happens in dreams.

translation.en: Ignore me. I'm leaving now.
[man, high-pitched] Come back later. We're doin' dishes.

translation.en: [gruffly] 'Kay, so that didn't work.
So, you're the kid.
What are you doing here?
And where's my dad?
[scoffs] Nobody told you?
I know what happened.
[sighs, grunts] Well, your dad and I were partners a long time ago,
translation.it: Io e tuo padre eravamo soci, tempo fa.

translation.en: before he went straight and had a kid.
translation.it: Ma poi lui ha fatto una figlia.

translation.en: Big mistake, in my opinion. [chuckles slightly, sighs deeply]
[snarling] Mad, bad, and dangerous to know.
Named Flip.
-You're Flip? -[grunts softly] Yeah.
I thought you were something my dad made up,
and you're different than I imagined.
Handsomer?
More "gorgeous-er," if you will?
Hairier.
-And… [sniffs] …smellier. -[Flip] Hmm.
I mean, I know you're not real,
but I always pictured, like, a normal human being.
translation.it: ma ti ho sempre immaginato come un essere umano normale.

translation.en: Okay, you just said like four insulting things on top of each other.
translation.it: Ok, mi hai appena insultato quattro volte.

translation.en: Rude.
-Listen, I just came to pay my respects. -[fly buzzes, splats]
translation.it: Sono venuto a farti le condoglianze.

translation.en: [chewing] Sorry for your loss. Hi-yah!
By ripping my dad's room apart?
translation.it: E distruggi la stanza di mio padre?

translation.en: Oh, that reminds me…
[chuckling] …your dad, he had a map.
About this big. Weird shapes and lines all over it.
translation.it: Grande più o meno così, con forme strane e linee ovunque,

translation.en: Picture with an oyster with a pearl on the back of it.
translation.it: e un'ostrica con una perla sul retro.

translation.en: It's one-of-a-kind, kid. We risked our lives stealing it.
translation.it: È unica. Abbiamo rischiato la vita per rubarla.

translation.en: -I never saw any map like that. -[Flip] Don't lie to me, kid!
translation.it: - Non l'ho mai vista. - Non mentire!

translation.en: Your dad would want me to have it.
translation.it: Tuo padre avrebbe voluto darla a me.

translation.en: I'm not lying.
Never mind, I'll find it myself. [blows a raspberry]
Hey, you can't just bust in here like some kind of thief.
translation.it: Ehi, non puoi entrare qui come un ladro.

translation.en: -You say thief like it's a bad thing. -[glass shatters]
translation.it: Lo dici come se fosse una brutta cosa.

translation.en: A thief just takes things that don't belong to them.
translation.it: Un ladro prende ciò che non gli appartiene.

translation.en: You can't take things from other people's dreams.
translation.it: Non puoi prendere cose dai sogni degli altri.

translation.en: [scoffs] Sure you can.
translation.it: Non puoi prendere cose dai sogni degli altri. Certo che sì. Basta sapere come entrare e uscire.

translation.en: Ya just gotta know how to get in and get out.
translation.it: Certo che sì. Basta sapere come entrare e uscire.

translation.en: I'm in your dream.
You're just a figment of my imagination.
translation.it: Sei solo frutto della mia immaginazione.

translation.en: You wish you could dream up somethin' this good. Look at that.
translation.it: Ti piacerebbe sognare qualcuno così! Guarda.

translation.en: Mm! I look good.
Please! I don't want you here.
translation.it: Per favore! Non ti voglio qui.

translation.en: I just want my dad.
[smacks lips] Okay.
What if there is a way you can see your dad again?
translation.it: E se ci fosse un modo per rivedere tuo padre?

translation.en: What do you mean?
I'm goin' on a little treasure hunt, and this treasure… is magic.
translation.it: Facciamo una piccola caccia al tesoro, un tesoro magico,

translation.en: Lets you wish for whatever you want here in Slumberland.
translation.it: che fa avverare ogni desiderio, qui a Slumberland.

translation.en: I could see my dad again.
Oh, yeah, you can see your dad again. Right here, every night.
translation.it: Sì, puoi rivedere tuo padre. Proprio qui, ogni sera.

translation.en: But I'm gonna need that map, kid.
translation.it: Ma mi serve quella mappa, piccola.

translation.en: -[tense music playing] -I don't know what you're talking about.
[sucks teeth] Yeah, I believe you.
Hey, wait! I can try to find the map. I can still come with you.
translation.it: Aspetta! Posso cercare la mappa e venire con te.

translation.en: Oh, that sounds super fun.
Except you got no gear, no skills, and without the map… oh, you're useless to me.
translation.it: Solo che non hai attrezzature né abilità, e senza la mappa sei inutile per me.

translation.en: -[Nemo gasps] -Time to wake up, kid.
A map.
Oh, you're up already. Good.
What are you doin'?
What's the weirdest dream you've ever had?
translation.it: Qual è il sogno più strano che tu abbia mai fatto?

translation.en: I don't remember my dreams.
Don't actually think I have any.
I brought you some milk, right?
translation.it: Ti ho portato del latte, ok?

translation.en: Are you, uh, excited for your first day of school?
translation.it: Sei emozionata per il tuo primo giorno di scuola?

translation.en: School?
[Uncle] This place should be amazing. It costs a fortune.
translation.it: Questo posto dev'essere fantastico. Costa una fortuna.

translation.en: My dad said schools are basically prisons.
translation.it: Mio padre diceva che le scuole sono prigioni.

translation.en: They keep kids locked up physically and mentally,
translation.it: Tengono i bambini rinchiusi fisicamente e mentalmente,

translation.en: prepare them for jobs that are also basically prisons,
translation.it: li preparano per lavori che sono altre prigioni,

translation.en: until they retire and go to a nursing home.
translation.it: per poi andare in pensione in una casa di cura.

translation.en: Their final prison.
School is not a prison.
translation.it: La scuola non è una prigione.

translation.en: Can I leave whenever I want to?
It's a little like a prison.
Bell doesn't help.
Nemo, hi. Welcome to Westbrook.
-I am Ms. Arya, lower school counselor. -Hey. Hi.
translation.it: Sono la signora Arya, psicologa della scuola elementare. Ciao!

translation.en: Well, I know what a… a difficult time this is but, um…
translation.it: So che è un momento molto difficile,

translation.en: Hey, do you know what the most resilient thing on earth is?
translation.it: ma sapete qual è la cosa più resistente al mondo?

translation.en: It's not titanium.
Is it tungsten? It has a higher tensile strength--
translation.it: Il tungsteno? Ha una resistenza a trazione…

translation.en: The human spirit. Oh, you mean metaphorically.
translation.it: - La forza interiore. - Ah, voleva dire metaforicamente.

translation.en: What you're going through, it's hard. But you know what?
translation.it: È un momento difficile. Ma sai una cosa?

translation.en: You are stronger than you know.
translation.it: Sei più forte di quanto pensi.

translation.en: Hey, can we talk for a sec?
-Oh, yeah. -Just one sec. Uh…
I, uh, just wanted to prepare you.
[quietly] Nemo's dad kinda raised her like a hermit.
translation.it: Il padre di Nemo le ha fatto fare una vita da eremita.

translation.en: Not in a bad way, just… you have your work cut out for you.
translation.it: Non in senso negativo, ma le darà un bel po' da fare.

translation.en: She… She's gonna need a lot of emotional support.
translation.it: Ha bisogno di molto sostegno emotivo.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, I'm hoping that you guys can help with all that.
translation.it: Sì. Spero che possiate aiutarmi voi.

translation.en: Oh. Well, we can't do that all by ourselves.
translation.it: Ma non possiamo farlo da soli.

translation.en: -No. -[both chuckle]
-Right? -Right. Obviously.
translation.it: - No. - Giusto? Giusto. Ovviamente. Non è una cosa che fate voi?

translation.en: Is that not something you do?
translation.it: Giusto. Ovviamente. Non è una cosa che fate voi?

translation.en: Look, I don't know how to take care of a little kid or talk about feelings.
translation.it: Non so prendermi cura dei bambini né parlare di sentimenti.

translation.en: Now, I think that she would be better off literally anywhere else.
[softly] Okay.
Oh, you have my hands.
You are capable of more than you think.
translation.it: Può fare molto più di quel che immagina.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Truly. You just gotta… -[chuckles lightly]
You just gotta connect with a part of yourself
translation.it: Deve entrare in contatto con una parte di sé

translation.en: that you're not used to accessing.
translation.it: a cui di solito non lascia spazio.

translation.en: Right.
You just gotta connect with her.
translation.it: Deve entrare in sintonia con lei.

translation.en: -Just try. -Okay.
-[door opens] -Hi, everyone. Hi. [quietly] Thanks, Ms. Young.
translation.it: Ciao a tutti. Grazie, maestra Young.

translation.en: Hi, guys. How's everybody doing?
This is Nemo. She's gonna be joining your class.
translation.it: Lei è Nemo, la vostra nuova compagna di classe.

translation.en: So if you could all just make her feel right at home,
translation.it: Se poteste farla sentire a casa,

translation.en: I would be so grateful.
Sorry.
Okay, everyone. Listen up.
In a victory for planet Earth,
we got compostable utensils in the cafeteria.
translation.it: La mensa ha le posate biodegradabili.

translation.en: We won!
Hmm. Uh, Nemo, Jamal.
translation.it: Nemo, lui è Jamal. Jamal, Nemo.

translation.en: -Jamal, Nemo. -[Jamal] It's a seven-day cycle.
translation.it: Nemo, lui è Jamal. Jamal, Nemo. È un ciclo continuo. Se arrivi tardi, hai un punto blu.

translation.en: You're late, you get a blue dot.
translation.it: È un ciclo continuo. Se arrivi tardi, hai un punto blu.

translation.en: Three blues, and you get a red dot, and your parents get a notification.
translation.it: Dopo tre blu hai un punto rosso, e ai genitori arriva la notifica.

translation.en: And you can get the app for your phone. I don't have a phone.

translation.en: That is refreshing.
You're gonna need the app, though.
Any clubs you're into?
I'm on recycling team, Model UN, ceramics club, Pop-Tarts, that's our improv group,

translation.en: lawn bowling, Slavic chorus, orchestra, woodworking, ultimate Frisbee…
translation.it: faccio bowling su prato, coro slavo, falegnameria, frisbee…

translation.en: Where'd you go to school before this?
I didn't. I was homeschooled.
translation.it: Non ci andavo. Studiavo a casa.

translation.en: Um, my dad and I lived in a lighthouse.
translation.it: Io e mio padre vivevamo in un faro.

translation.en: A lighthouse? That sounds awesome.
Why'd you move here?
My…
My dad's on a trip. That's why I'm here.
translation.it: Mio padre è in viaggio. Quindi starò qui da mio zio per un po'.

translation.en: I'm staying with my uncle, just temporarily.
translation.it: Quindi starò qui da mio zio per un po'.

translation.en: Oh. Cool.
Those are my Undeadheads.
We dress up as zombies and watch zombie movies.
translation.it: Ci vestiamo da zombie e guardiamo film di zombie.

translation.en: It's cooler than it sounds… I think.
translation.it: È più figo di quanto sembri. Credo.

translation.en: Uh, come sit with us.
Um, I… I need to do my math.

The World of Dreams.

Bureau of Subconscious Activities, BOSA.

[Flip] Greatest treasure in the world.

translation.it: Il problema è che i poliziotti dei sogni

translation.en: All right, listen, we're looking for reoccurring dreams.

See ya. [sighs]

…squirt. [chuckles]

about a man…
on Christmas Eve…
I think.

translation.it: che, invece di avere un diametro di sette centimetri,

translation.en: -What to do? -[gentle music playing]
You would need a Christmas miracle.

translation.it: Ma poi il nostro eroe capì

translation.it: che le maniglie erano della misura perfetta

translation.en: for standard cabinet drawer pulls.
You must be exhausted. That was the exciting part.

Well.

You can end up like Flip, alone, in a cell forever.

translation.en: [laughing] We're gonna get our Pearls.
Yeah, about that. I have to tell you something.
translation.it: Sì, a proposito. Devo dirti una cosa.

translation.en: Okay, well, just wait a second.
[snickers] Classic, right?
[chuckles] Yeah. There are no Pearls.
[sighs, chuckling slightly] What're you talking about?
It's a myth. Agent Green told me.
translation.it: È una leggenda. Me l'ha detto l'agente Green.

translation.en: And you believed her? [scoffs]
She was just tryin' to keep you in your place.
translation.it: Vuole solo che resti al tuo posto.

translation.en: It ain't no myth, believe me.
-How do you know? -'Cause your dad saw them.
translation.it: Come fai a saperlo? Perché tuo padre le ha viste.

translation.en: We were there. Sea of Nightmares?
translation.it: Ci siamo stati, nel Mare degli Incubi.

translation.en: Yeah, he went all the way down the whirlpool. All the way to the bottom.
translation.it: Sì, lui è andato giù nel vortice. Fino in fondo.

translation.en: And then he saw the Pearls, thousands of 'em.
translation.it: E lì ha visto le perle, a migliaia.

translation.en: Your dad had the greatest imagination… but he would never lie.
translation.it: Tuo padre aveva una grande immaginazione, ma non mentiva mai.

translation.en: We can't go back.
We're not goin' back. [chuckles]
[Flip] C'mon, kid.
-[both panting] -Ooh, it's bright.
-[Pig squealing] -Much better.
Okay, here we go.
Pig!
Come on, kid!
The final door's gotta be out here somewhere.
translation.it: L'ultima porta dev'essere qui da qualche parte.

translation.en: Keep goin'! Go! Go!
-[both panting] -[Flip] Hey.
Oh, hey, hey, hey, hey. Whoa.
[Nemo] So, what do we do now?
[in Canadian accent] Whoa! Oh, hey there! How about this view, eh?
translation.it: Ehi, voi. Vi piace il panorama, eh?

translation.en: -Canada? -Like I said, number-one dream.
translation.it: Canada, no? Te l'ho detto, è il sogno numero uno.

translation.en: Go away! [grunts]
Eat this, Green!
-Come on, Flip! -What're you doin'?
-[Nemo] The geese! -[Flip] Oh, but you're crazy!
[Canadian] Whoa, hey!
[laughs] You think that's a thing of beaut?
Well, let me tell ya, there's a Timmies.
translation.it: E lì c'è anche il Caffè Timmies,

translation.en: That's a Tim Horton's for ya. Pert near 20 clicks that way--
translation.it: che voi chiamate Tim Horton, è qui vicino…

translation.en: -Hey, buddy. -[Canadian] Oh, yeah, eh?
I wanna swipe your gooser here, eh?
Uh, yeah. Sure, bud. Scooch my goose.
translation.it: Sì, certo, amico. Si chiama Scooch.

translation.en: [laughing] Keep your stick on the ice!
-Ooh. Right down there. -[goose honks]
Oh, man.
-Hey, Bob? -[giant goose honks] -[Flip] That was awesome. -[loud honk]
-[Flip imitates honk, sighs] -Bye, Bob.
I think you and I should be partners. What do you think?
translation.it: Io e te dovremmo essere soci, che ne pensi?

translation.en: Look, there's something I need to tell you.
There it is! I found it before you!
translation.it: Eccola! L'ho trovata prima di te!

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Nemo] Race ya! Last one there is a rotten dream!
translation.it: Ti sfido! Chi arriva ultimo è un brutto sogno!

translation.en: -[energetic orchestral music playing] -Wait, wait, wait. -Be cool. Be cool. Be cool. -[Pig snorts]
[quietly] It's the final door.
And it's open.
-Which is a first. -[whispering] Why are you being quiet?
translation.it: Per la prima volta. Perché parli piano?

translation.en: -[Flip] 'Cause it's scary. -[Nemo] And dark.
-[Flip] Yeah, and dark. -[Nemo] And creepy.
[Flip] Yeah.
-[music swells] -[shouts] Hey!
I was just makin' sure no one's in there.
translation.it: Volevo assicurarmi che non ci fosse nessuno.

translation.en: Well, you know, it's the gateway to the Sea of Nightmares, so… [chuckles]
translation.it: Beh, sai, è la porta per il Mare degli Incubi, quindi…

translation.en: Pearls are in here somewhere. All right.
translation.it: Le perle sono lì da qualche parte. Ok.

translation.en: Okay.
Ready?
-[Nemo takes a deep breath] -Here we go, partner.
-I don't wanna go first. -It's okay.
translation.it: - Non voglio andare prima io. - Non aver paura.

translation.en: -But I'm scared. -[Flip] It's an initiation, so…
translation.it: - Non voglio andare prima io. - Non aver paura. - Ma ho paura. - È un'iniziazione.

translation.en: It's cold.
[Flip] That's a whole lot of water.
Okay. [clears throat]
Gonna go for a little swim. No big deal.
translation.it: Mi farò una nuotata, niente di che.

translation.en: I know who you are.
I found out in the Waking World.
Why the hell didn't you tell me?
Wait. Do I still have my hair?
Yeah. Just not as much.
Let me guess.
I'm a famous outlaw, yeah? Men fear me? Ladies love me?
translation.it: Sono un famoso fuorilegge, vero? Gli uomini mi temono, le donne mi amano.

translation.en: You're a doorknob salesman.
What'd you call me?
You're my dad's brother, Philip.
translation.it: Sei il fratello di mio padre, Philip.

translation.en: You and my dad came to Slumberland every night when you were kids.
translation.it: Tu e mio padre venivate a Slumberland ogni sera, da piccoli.

translation.en: And then, he left.
Oh, wow.
After that, Philip stopped dreaming, and you couldn't wake up.
translation.it: Poi Philip ha smesso di sognare, e tu non sei riuscito a svegliarti.

translation.en: I remember.
But when you get your Pearl,
you can wake up, and you can be one person again.
translation.it: potrai svegliarti e tornare a essere te stesso.

translation.en: This is a buzzkill.
I'm gonna get us both killed for that guy?
translation.it: Ci faremo uccidere per colpa sua?

translation.en: We're so close, and he needs you.
translation.it: Ci siamo quasi, lui ha bisogno di te.

translation.en: Well, I don't need him, all right? I got everything that I want right here.
translation.it: Beh, io non ho bisogno di lui. Ho tutto ciò che voglio qui.

translation.en: Wine, women, waffles. The three dubs.
translation.it: Donne, dolci e distillati, le tre D.

translation.en: Not necessarily in that order.
I'm not a knob seller. I'm a flippin' outlaw!
translation.it: Non sono un venditore di maniglie, sono un gran fuorilegge!

translation.en: But I thought that when we get our Pearls,
translation.it: Ma forse, quando avremo le perle,

translation.en: I could be with my dad at night, and during the day, I could be with you.
translation.it: potrei stare di notte con mio padre e di giorno con te.

translation.en: You could be like my part-time dad.
I am nobody's dad, kid.
translation.it: Non sono il padre di nessuno.

translation.en: So you're just giving up?
I'll tell you what I'm gonna do.
I'm gonna go find a dream with a bar in it,
translation.it: troverò un sogno con un bar

translation.en: and then I'm gonna drink until I forget who I am again.
translation.it: e berrò fino a dimenticare di nuovo chi sono.

translation.en: Then I'm gonna go find someone's ex. 'Cause there's a lot of them around here.
translation.it: E troverò l'ex ragazza di qualcuno. Ce ne sono molte qui.

translation.en: But I… I did the Double-Knock.
translation.it: Ma ho fatto la doppia bussata!

translation.en: So did I, kid.
The night your dad left, I begged him to stay.
translation.it: La sera in cui tuo padre è andato via, l'ho pregato di restare.

translation.en: I'll go without you.
I'll see my dad again, and I don't care if I never wake up.
translation.it: Rivedrò mio padre, non m'importa se non mi sveglio più.

translation.en: Hey, no. You can't.
It's too dangerous to go in alone.
translation.it: È troppo pericoloso entrare da soli.

translation.en: You can't tell me what to do… 'cause you're not my dad.
translation.it: Non puoi dirmi cosa fare, perché non sei mio padre.

translation.en: I never shoulda brought you.
Just go back to where you belong. Otherwise, you're gonna end up like me.
translation.it: Torna a casa tua. Altrimenti farai la mia stessa fine.

translation.en: [in a woman's voice] Nemo. Wake up.
Wake up!
-[Nemo gasps, shudders] -[Arya] Nemo?
Get your things.
We're calling your uncle.
[Arya] It's not just the lying, Nemo.
translation.it: Non è solo per le bugie, Nemo. È che vai via di nascosto.

translation.en: It's sneaking off like that. No one knew where you were.
translation.it: Non è solo per le bugie, Nemo. È che vai via di nascosto. Nessuno sapeva dove fossi.

translation.en: For all we knew, you could've been in terrible danger.
translation.it: Nessuno sapeva dove fossi. Pensavamo che fossi in grave pericolo.

translation.en: Yeah.
Why would you do that?
You wouldn't understand.
Why don't you try me?
Okay.
Well, m-- Maybe it would help if, uh… if you went first.
translation.it: Forse è meglio se inizia lei.

translation.en: Would you like to tell Nemo how you're feeling?
translation.it: Vuole dire a Nemo come si sente?

translation.en: I don't know what you want me to say. I don't do feelings.
translation.it: Non so cosa vuole che dica. Non provo sentimenti.

translation.en: Everyone does feelings, whether you like it or not.
translation.it: Tutti provano sentimenti, che le piaccia o no.

translation.en: You two are in the same boat. You just don't realize it.
translation.it: Siete sulla stessa barca, ma non ve ne rendete conto.

translation.en: Guys, come on. You're both struggling with powerful emotions,
translation.it: State attraversando entrambi un periodo difficile,

translation.en: and you just… you just need to deal with them.
Do we, though?
Um, everybody always says that, but… I'm not convinced.
translation.it: Lo dicono tutti, ma non ne sono convinto.

translation.en: I-- I-- I've [scoffs] I've never dealt with my feelings, and I'm fine.
translation.it: Non ho mai affrontato i miei sentimenti e sto bene.

translation.en: I was fine.
Should've just had them send me to foster care.
You'd probably be better off.
At least foster parents know how to be parents.
translation.it: Almeno i genitori adottivi sanno fare i genitori.

translation.en: Nemo, we should probably talk.
I don't wanna talk. You wanna get rid of me, so get rid of me.
translation.it: Non voglio parlare. Se vuoi sbarazzarti di me, fallo.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm not trying to get rid of you, Nemo. I'm… I'm trying to help you.
translation.it: Non voglio liberarmi di te, Nemo. Voglio aiutarti.

translation.en: You're as bad as he is.
What? Who?
You only care about yourself.
Are you kidding? I have done nothing but take care of you.
translation.it: Stai scherzando? Mi sono preso cura di te.

translation.en: I-- I-- I cook. I-- I entertain.
I try.
And what do I get in return? You just lie to my face.
translation.it: E cosa ottengo in cambio? Mi hai mentito guardandomi in faccia.

translation.en: I think we're bonding, and I let you borrow my precious lockpicks so--
translation.it: Credevo che stessimo legando, ti ho prestato i miei grimaldelli…

translation.en: Nobody cares about door stuff, okay? Why do you think you have no friends?
translation.it: A nessuno interessano le porte. Perché non hai amici, secondo te?

translation.en: Why do you think you live alone?
You should go to your room!
Where do you think I'm going? You're not my dad!
translation.it: Dove pensi che vada? Non sei mio padre!

translation.en: Hey, I'm not trying to be!
translation.it: Ehi, non sto cercando di esserlo!

translation.en: I live alone because I like it that way!
translation.it: Vivo da solo perché mi piace!

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this to happen. I didn't ask you to come live here!
translation.it: Non l'ho voluto io. Non ti ho chiesto di venire a vivere qui!

translation.en: But I'm glad you did.
translation.it: Ma sono felice che tu sia qui.

translation.en: Pig, we're goin' home.
[Philip] Nemo?
No, I don't know. I don't--
Carla, I don't know. I just woke up, and she wasn't here.
translation.it: Carla, non lo so. Mi sono svegliato e lei non c'era.

translation.en: Well, I have no idea where she would go.
translation.it: Non ho idea di dove possa essere.

translation.en: Right.
Pig!
-Oh, yeah. [laughs] -[air-raid sirens wailing]
[Flip] Oh! The End of the Line!
-It's party time! -[neon sign buzzing]
translation.it: L'ultima fermata! È ora di festeggiare!

translation.en: Yeah, baby! Oh!
Number one! Top of Slumberland, baby!
translation.it: Sono il numero uno di Slumberland.

translation.en: You see that?
Hope they catch the bastard.
[Flip] Oh, yeah. Guy seems like a real bad egg. You know? Pee-yew.
translation.it: Sì. Fa proprio schifo. Sai, puzza.

translation.en: He took a little girl to the Sea of Nightmares,
translation.it: Ha portato una bambina nel Mare degli Incubi,

translation.en: and then he ditched her, and she went in alone.
translation.it: l'ha abbandonata, e lei è entrata da sola.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Hey, you're…
A shiny pink diamond?
-Yeah. Pretty, isn't it? Hi-yah! -That's nice.
[Nemo, echoing] Come on, Pig. Grab one, and let's go.
translation.it: Dai, Maiale. Prendine una e andiamo.

translation.en: [exclaims] Yeah!
Flip?
[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip] I got ya. Oh!
Get in the cab!
You came back for me!
Yeah. Outlaw Code. Never leave your partner behind.
translation.it: Sì. È il Codice dei Fuorilegge. Non si abbandona un socio.

translation.en: -Even if she is a pain in the… -Applesauce.
translation.it: - Nemmeno se è un rompi… - Scatole!

translation.en: Applesauce! [laughs]
Oh! I got a Pearl.
Oh! Aces!
So long, suckers!
Oh, hey! Hey, guys!
-[Pig squeals] -[screaming] Nightmare!
We have to get to the lighthouse! Green said it's my safe place!
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare al faro! Green ha detto che è il mio rifugio!

translation.en: I know!
Don't look down!
-Pull up! -I am!
-[Nemo screaming] -Oh my! Oh my!
-[grunting] -[Nemo whimpers] No! Drive the plane!
-Flip, come on. Flip! -[Pig oinks]
[Canadian] Aw, jeez. What a gong show.
Okay, one minute, you think you're going out for a rip…
Oh. Hey, sorry, guy.
And the next thing you know, you're goin' for a dip.
translation.it: E in men che non si dica ti ritrovi a fare un tuffo.

translation.en: There he is.
-[Canadian whimpering] -Get in here!
Come on. Hey, Emmett, you party?
translation.it: Forza! Ehi, Emmett, sei dei nostri?

translation.en: I party.
Come here! Get in here!
[in Southern accent] Hey, Emmett, take a right.
Here we go.
-I can't. I can't. What's that? -Come here, buddy.
translation.it: - No! - Vieni qui, amico. Cos'è quello?

translation.en: Hit it, Emmett!
[Flip] Yeah!
Help! Oh, my hair! My hair!
[in Spanish] I knew you'd return!
I smelled your musk.
translation.it: Ho sentito il tuo cattivo odore.

translation.en: Uh, sí, sí, sí. Pero no.
Pero no.
-[Canadian gasps] -[announcer on TV] Now, McRoy to center. There's O'Reilly… Great pass to Johnson, and a goal!
translation.it: McRoy al centro. Ecco O'Reilly. Ottimo passaggio per Joseph, e segna!

translation.en: -He scores! -Yes! Let's go! Let's go!
-[motor whirring] -[wind whipping] -[wistful piano music playing] -[thunder rumbling]
[sighs] We're gonna make it, kid.
Come on. I see the lighthouse.
Come on, kid. We're almost there. You can finally make your wish.
translation.it: Dai, ci siamo quasi. Potrai esprimere il tuo desiderio.

translation.en: [gasps] What's wrong?
[weakly] Oh… I don't feel so good.
[Flip] Nemo!
[Carla] Hey, slow down! Slow down!
Pig.
[Flip] What's wrong?
[weakly] Something's not right.
I'm gonna get you home.
You'll be safe at home.
There!
There!
Wait, the Pearl.
I dropped the Pearl. We have to go back.
translation.it: Mi è caduta. Dobbiamo tornare indietro.

translation.en: You get to the lighthouse. I'll get the Pearl, okay? Go.
translation.it: Tu vai al faro, io prendo la perla. Ok? Vai!

translation.en: Wait. No, not without you!
translation.it: No, non vado senza di te!

translation.en: -[Flip grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
-[Flip yelling and grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip groaning] Nemo!
[Flip, echoing] Nemo, go! Get to the lighthouse!
Say hi to your dad for me.
Flip? Wake up.
[Carla] Philip!
What are you doing?
[Carla] No! Get down! Philip! Philip!
[Carla] No!
Let's go home.
Well, this is gonna be a buttload of paperwork.
translation.it: Beh, qui ci vorrà un mucchio di scartoffie.

translation.en: So Nemo, how do you feel? Different?
Big journey, all by yourself.
translation.it: Dopo un lungo viaggio da sola…

translation.en: I see you've found yourself a Pearl.
translation.it: Vedo che hai trovato una perla.

translation.en: Guess it's not a myth after all.
I didn't get my dad back.
translation.it: Non mi ha ridato mio padre.

translation.en: You had to give up your dream.
translation.it: Hai dovuto rinunciare al tuo sogno.

translation.en: I guess you found something more important.
translation.it: Immagino che tu abbia trovato qualcosa di più importante.

translation.en: Right, better get to work, then.
translation.it: Beh, ora è meglio che torni al lavoro.

translation.en: You've got a good pig there.
Give it a squeeze for me.
-[Pig grunts] -[Green] Told you.
You have the dream you're meant to have.
translation.it: Hai già il sogno che ti serve.

translation.en: We make sure of that.
What you do next…?
Well, that's up to you.
Ugh! Seriously? Look at this mess!
Can I get a cleaning crew in here pronto? Come on!
translation.it: Mi mandate l'impresa di pulizie? Veloci!

translation.en: [crying] I missed you so much.
I miss you.
Race you to the top?
Help!
-Nemo! She's not breathing. -[Carla] Okay.
We got her! We got her. It's okay. Okay.
translation.it: Ci siamo noi, va tutto bene.

translation.en: Did you ever figure it out? What the lighthouse is for?
translation.it: L'hai capito? A cosa serve il faro?

translation.en: -[Pig oinking] -It's not to keep ships safe.
translation.it: Non serve a proteggere le navi.

translation.en: No. If we wanted to do that, we'd never let 'em leave harbor, would we?
translation.it: No. Per proteggerle, non dovremmo mai lasciarle salpare.

translation.en: [Carla] Nothing. Okay. One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.it: Niente. Ok. Uno, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei…

translation.en: -Come on, Nemo! -[Carla] Seven, eight, nine.
-[Philip] Breathe! -[Carla] Come on. Oh.
To guide you on your journey.
That's right.
So you can see things that the lighthouse keeper can only dream of.
translation.it: Per vedere cose che il guardiano del faro può solo sognare.

translation.en: I didn't teach you all those things so you could live on an island.
translation.it: Non ti ho insegnato tutte quelle cose per farti vivere su un'isola.

translation.en: I did it so that you could know…
you can do anything.
[Carla] Okay, come on, Nemo.
One, two, three…
I didn't think I could go on without you.
translation.it: Pensavo di non poter andare avanti senza di te.

translation.en: You traveled to the Sea of Nightmares and came back home safe again.
translation.it: Sei arrivata fino al Mare degli Incubi e sei tornata sana e salva.

translation.en: After that, I don't think the Waking World's gonna be too difficult.
translation.it: Non credo che il mondo cosciente sarà un problema per te.

translation.en: But that's up to you.
Life is waiting for you, Nemo.
It would be a shame to miss that.
[crying] I have to go back.
That's my girl.
[takes a deep breath] And you never forget…
how very proud I am of you.
And keep an eye on that brother of mine.
He seems normal, but he's not.
translation.it: Sembra una persona normale, ma non lo è.

translation.en: Deep down, he's a wild man.
translation.it: In fondo, è un uomo selvaggio.

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
[Carla] Okay, let's go!
Come on, get her over!
There we go! Good girl, Nemo! -[laughing] Good girl! -[Philip sobbing]
[Carla] Good girl.
You're okay. You're okay.
I got you. And I'm not gonna let go of you ever, okay?
translation.it: Ora ci sono io. E non ti lascio più, ok?

translation.en: [softly] Yeah. [mimics Flip] It's Flip.
And Philip. Philip and Flip.
Flilip? [high-pitched snicker]
-[Undeadheads groan] -[Nemo] Bye, Jamal. See you tomorrow.
You know, not a lot of people know this, but I'm actually a master pickpocket.
translation.it: Non lo sanno in molti, ma in realtà sono un grande borseggiatore.

translation.en: Oh, come on. No, you're not. [chuckles]
-Oh my G-- -You have very smooth wrists.
translation.it: - Oh! - Ha un polso molto delicato.

translation.en: [Arya] Wait. What? How did you…?
I'm gonna take you sailing.
Maybe next time you can come with us.
translation.it: La prossima volta può venire con noi.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd love to. [chuckles]
Aces.
Oh. Oh, wait. I need my watch back.
[Philip and Arya laugh] Yeah.
No. No, seriously. Can I get my watch back?
translation.it: No, sul serio, posso riavere l'orologio?

translation.en: [quietly] Call me.
Oh, great. You're already dressed for bed.
translation.it: Fantastico, sei già pronta per andare a letto.

translation.en: [Nemo] Well, I don't like to be late.
translation.it: Beh, non mi piace fare tardi.

translation.en: So, what's the plan tonight?
translation.it: Qual è il piano di stasera?

translation.en: I don't know. I think I might just wander and see what happens.
translation.it: Non lo so. Potrei semplicemente vagare e vedere cosa succede.

translation.en: Sounds good.
-Night-night, kiddo. I love you. -I love you too.
-I'll try to be on time. -[Nemo giggles]
Sweet dreams.
